process.name: purify rock salt into table/epsom salt and other compounds
extract nitrogen compounds from regolith (large batch)
make pulp from cane fiber and crop waste
make pulp from cane fiber and crop waste (large batch)
make paper, napkin and toilet tissue from pulp
make paper, napkin and toilet tissue from pulp (large batch)
make bleaching chemical for paper making
make bleaching chemical for paper making (large batch)
make sodium hypochlorite for bleaching and sanitation
make sodium hypochlorite for bleaching and sanitation (large batch)
make compost by mixing crop waste and food waste
make compost by mixing crop waste and food waste (large batch)
make fertilizers for growing crops (large batch)
extract aluminum oxide from regolith (large batch)
extract silicon dioxide from sand (large batch)
do carbon monoxide iron reduction (large batch)
process regolith-B rich in poly-hydrated sulfate
process regolith-C rich in phyllo-silicate
process regolith-D basaltic
reduce gypsum to calcium carbonate with carbon
process.description:
Wrapping two processes: CaSO<sub>4</sub> * 2H<sub>2</sub>O (gypsum) + 2C -> CaS + 2CO<sub>2</sub> + 2H<sub>2</sub>O CaS + H<sub>2</sub>O + CO<sub>2</sub> -> CaCO<sub>3</sub> (calcium carbonate) + H<sub>2</sub>S Note: ignoring hydrogen sulfide as waste for now.
Gypsum has up to 8.6 % water

process.name: reduce gypsum to calcium carbonate with carbon (large batch)
process.description:
Wrapping two processes: CaSO<sub>4</sub> * 2H<sub>2</sub>O (gypsum) + 2C -> CaS + 2CO<sub>2</sub> + 2H<sub>2</sub>O CaS + H<sub>2</sub>O + CO<sub>2</sub> -> CaCO<sub>3</sub> (calcium carbonate) + H<sub>2</sub>S Note: ignoring hydrogen sulfide as waste for now.
Gypsum has up to 8.6 % water

process.name: reduce gypsum to calcium carbonate with carbon monoxide
reduce gypsum to calcium carbonate with carbon monoxide (large batch)
reduce gypsum to calcium carbonate with hydrogen
reduce gypsum to calcium carbonate with hydrogen (large batch)
bake calcium carbonate to lime (large batch)
produce polyester resin
process.description: This is to produce unsaturated polyester resin (C<sub>10</sub>H<sub>8</sub>O<sub>4</sub>). We don't have a detailed process for producing polyester, so we're just using component elements.

process.name: make coolant bottle
process.description: Using ethylene glycol as a coolant. C<sub>2</sub>H<sub>4</sub>O + H<sub>2</sub>O -> HOCH<sub>2</sub>CH<sub>2</sub>OH

process.name: make eva backpack
process.description: Polyethylene box with steel frame and fiberglass cloth straps.

process.name: do steel ingot nickel alloying (large batch)
roll heat pipe from copper sheet
roll heat pipe from aluminum sheet
mix regolith mortar
process.description: Makes dry mortar mix with cement and regolith (1:5 mixture).

process.name: manufacture polycarbonate roofing
process.description: Asahi/Chi Mei produces DPC (polycarbonate) from DMC which is produced via methanolysis of ethylene carbonate. Ethylene carbonate is produced by the reaction between ethylene oxide and carbon dioxide.

process.name: produce bisphenol-a
process.description: Bisphenol A (BPA), a colourless crystalline solid belonging to the family of organic compounds; its molecular formula is C15H16O2. BPA is best known for its use in the manufacture of polycarbonate plastics and epoxy resins

process.name: manufacture fuel cell stack
process.description: Each fuel cell stack comprises 25 solid oxide fuel cells at 5 kWe.
